dsOverview.title: Daily and Monthly Texas Surface Observations, 1898-1975

summary.p: Daily and monthly surface observations for Texas stations for January 1898 to December 1975.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: TNRIS > Texas Natural Resources Information System
